Title: New taxa with small primary conidia in Neoconidiobolus
Keywords:
Ancylistaceae  Morphology  Taxonomy  1 new species  2 new
combinations
Abstract:
Under the previous study with combined analyses of
morphology and molecular data, the genus Neoconidiobolus is established
to instead of the subgenus Conidiobolus which produces neither
microconidia nor capilliconidia. In this study, morphological characters
and phylogenetic analysesa reveal three new taxa in the genus
Neoconidiobolus viz. N. kunyushanensis B. Huang & Y. Nie, sp. nov.
N. lamprauges (Drechsler) B. Huang & Y. Nie, comb. nov. N. nanodes
(Drechsler) B. Huang & Y. Nie, comb. nov.
